meanings.sent1: The rabbit leaped over the log.
meanings.sent2: The athlete leaped over the hurdle effortlessly.
meanings.sent3: The cat leaped onto the counter to catch the mouse.
meanings.sent4: Her heart leaped with joy when she saw her long-lost friend.
meanings.sent5: The flames leaped high into the night sky, illuminating the darkness.

meanings.sent1: She leaped across the finish line and won the race.
meanings.sent2: He leaped out of bed when he heard the alarm clock.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel leaped from tree to tree, gathering nuts for winter.
meanings.sent4: The idea leaped into his mind like a bolt of lightning.
meanings.sent5: The dolphin leaped gracefully out of the water, performing a perfect arc.
